definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

pinyin: Ke3 kou3 Ke3 le4 Gong1 si1

sentences.english: Our Salute Brand Coffee is the most popular beverages offered in the market.
sentences.chinese: 海軍牌咖啡，味道香農可口，最受顧客喜愛。

sentences.english: I want some more of your dynamite stewed beef, please.
sentences.chinese: 請再給我一些你們那種美味可口的燉牛肉。

sentences.english: Surprisingly, after chewing it for a bit, he found it sweetish and rather pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 當下伸手接過，咬了一口，咀嚼之下，倒也甘美可口。

sentences.english: The coco-cola frothed as it was poured out.
sentences.chinese: 可口可樂倒出來時泛起泡沫。

sentences.english: Goizueta said Coke needed a larger share of that market.
sentences.chinese: 古茲維塔說，可口可樂需要在那塊市場做大佔有率。

sentences.english: The Coca-Cola Company is a great example of repeating past successes.
sentences.chinese: 可口可樂公司是一個重複過去成功經驗的偉大榜樣。

sentences.english: Coca Cola can be used to cure Jellyfish stings.
sentences.chinese: 被水母蟄傷也可以用可口可樂來治療。

sentences.english: To share credit information of credit customer with bottler.
sentences.chinese: 與太古可口可樂各個裝瓶廠分享信用客戶信用信息。

sentences.english: She counted three bowls with nice food in them.
sentences.chinese: 她數了一下，有三個碗，碗裏盛了可口的食物。

sentences.english: I Didn’t know that Coca Cola can be used to cure Jellyfish stings.
sentences.chinese: 被水母蟄傷也可以用可口可樂來治療哦。

sentences.english: Coca Cola is an excellent rust buster.
sentences.chinese: 可口可樂是鐵鏽的“天敵”。

sentences.english: Eat up high-caloric food and can't give up coke-cola.
sentences.chinese: 喫高熱量的夜宵離不開可口可樂。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Coca-Cola is trying to get hipper without the help of any celebrities.
sentences.chinese: 同時，可口可樂正在嘗試不借助名人的效應趕上時代。

sentences.english: And Coca-Cola managed to make itself one of the most widely distributed products of wartime.
sentences.chinese: 可口可樂更力爭上游，成爲戰時最暢銷產品之一。

sentences.english: The chicken roulade and roasted fillet of sole were dull to this tongue;
sentences.chinese: 雞肉卷和烤鰨魚魚片又是那麼綿軟可口。

sentences.english: The pickled vegetable of bottled coriander heart is convenient and high quality.
sentences.chinese: 瓶裝香菜心醬菜，香味濃郁，脆爽可口，是方便。

definition: to whet the appetite/appetizing/to amuse oneself at sb's expense/to tease
to smell, look and taste great
to be fond of eating/to be gluttonous
taste/texture (of food)/how food feels in the mouth
